humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the largest invasive tumor size is 1.8 by 1.2 by 1.0 cm. According to the rules provided, T1 tumors are 2 cm or less, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm, and T3 tumors are more than 5 cm. Since the largest tumor size is more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm, the T stage is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for breast cancer is based on the size of the tumor. In this report, the size of the invasive ductal carcinoma is given as 1.8 by 1.2 by 1.0 cm. The T stage for a tumor of this size is T2 (tumor size > 2 cm and ≤ 5 cm). Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
